{{TPRGT Story
|character          = Yaoyao
|time               = 2023-03-06
|zh                 = 
;今天是瑶瑶的生日哦，我们快去为她庆祝吧！
:'''七七：'''竹笋，给你。
:'''瑶瑶：'''谢谢你！七七，你还记得我吗？
:'''七七：'''记得，你是…唔…小团雀。可爱。
:'''瑶瑶：'''哈哈，我是瑶瑶，是七七的好朋友哦！
:'''七七：'''七七的…好朋友…
:'''瑶瑶：'''没错，瑶瑶一直都是七七的朋友。
:'''七七：'''瑶瑶一个人，很危险。有野林猪。
:'''瑶瑶：'''没关系，瑶瑶是和其他朋友一起来的，他们很可靠哦！
:'''七七：'''其他朋友？
:'''瑶瑶：'''就在那边&mdash;&mdash;
:'''派蒙：'''旅行者！加油！用力啊啊啊！
:'''旅行者：'''派蒙！好痛！快松手啊啊啊！
|dialogue_review_zh = 「瑶瑶一直都是七七好朋友哦。」
|en                 =
;Today is [[Yaoyao]]'s birthday, let's go and celebrate with her!
:'''Qiqi:''' [[Bamboo Shoot]]. For you.
:'''Yaoyao:''' Thank you! Qiqi, do you remember me?
:'''Qiqi:''' Qiqi remembers. You are... mmm... little [[Finches|Finch]]. Cute.
:'''Yaoyao:''' Haha, I'm Yaoyao! I'm your best friend, Qiqi!
:'''Qiqi:''' Qiqi's... best friend...
:'''Yaoyao:''' That's right, I've always been your best friend.
:'''Qiqi:''' Yaoyao's all alone. Very dangerous. There are [[Forest Boar]]s.
:'''Yaoyao:''' Don't worry, Yaoyao's here with other friends too. They're very reliable!
:'''Qiqi:''' Other friends?
:'''Yaoyao:''' They're right over there&mdash;
:'''Paimon:''' Keep going, Traveler! Put your back into ittttt!
:'''Traveler:''' Paimon! That hurts! Let gooooooo!
|dialogue_review_en = "Yaoyao's always been your best friend, Qiqi."
}}
